Title: AI Challenger | Enveda: Turning discoveries into life-saving medicines, faster
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Viswa Colluru, CEO & founder at Enveda shares how AI is helping them unlock the hidden chemical code, identify molecules, and revolutionize how the pharmaceutical industry discovers medicine. With their new approach, they can deliver drug candidates to clinical trials four times faster and at nearly one-tenth the cost. Watch Viswa Colluru, CEO & founder at Enveda AI Challenger video.

Lern more: https://msft.it/6058SQnfg
